home.title: Music Artist
home.tagline: hi, im sound blue, i make music.
home.description: South Korean indie artist and music producer. Creating original BGM, soundtracks, and instrumental music.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: Sound Blue collects minimal information necessary to provide our services. Currently, this site does not collect any personal information.

cookies.title: 2. Cookies
cookies.content: This site stores theme preferences (light/dark mode) and language settings in local storage to improve user experience.

thirdParty.title: 3. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: This site is hosted on Cloudflare Pages. Please refer to Cloudflare's privacy policy for more information.

contact.title: 4. Contact
contact.content: For privacy-related inquiries, please contact us through our GitHub repository.

use.title: 1. Use of Service
use.content: By using the Sound Blue website, you agree to these terms of service.

copyright.title: 2. Copyright
copyright.content: All content on this site (music, images, text, etc.) is protected by SoundBlueMusic's copyright. Unauthorized reproduction, distribution, or modification is prohibited.

disclaimer.title: 3. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This site is provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties.

changes.title: 4. Changes to Terms
changes.content: These terms may be changed without prior notice. Updated terms become effective when posted on this site.

soundRecording.title: Sound Recording License
soundRecording.description: Sound Blue's sound recordings (field recordings) may only be used for creating original works.

permitted.title: Permitted
items: Use in creative works (videos, music, games, etc.)
Modify, transform, and create derivative works
Use in personal and commercial creative projects

prohibited.title: Prohibited
items: Redistribution of sounds prohibited - Cannot distribute original or modified sound files
Standalone sale or distribution of sound files
Resale as sound libraries or packs
Standalone sharing without incorporation into creative works

legal.title: Legal Restrictions
items: Copyright registration prohibited - You may not register copyright claims on these recordings
Patent applications prohibited - You may not file patents based on these recordings
Violation of these terms immediately terminates your license to use the recordings

website.title: Website & Original Works
website.content: All original works on this website — including but not limited to music, compositions, text, design, images, and code — are created by and exclusively owned by SoundBlueMusic. Sound recordings (field recordings) are subject to the separate license above.

soundRecording.title: Sound Recording
soundRecording.intro: Field recordings captured with microphones from various locations, available for use in creative works.

about.title: About
about.content: Sound Blue's Sound Recording project captures high-quality sounds from everyday life and makes them available for use in creative works.

types.title: Recording Types
items: Urban ambience (streets, cafes, public transit, etc.)

license.title: License
license.content: All sound recordings may **only be used for creating original works**. Redistribution, sale, or standalone distribution is prohibited. **Copyright registration and patent applications on these recordings are strictly prohibited.**

downloads.title: Downloads
downloads.content: The sound recording library is coming soon.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Sound Blue & SoundBlueMusic
about.intro: South Korean indie artist and music producer creating original BGM, soundtracks, and instrumental music.

artist.title: Sound Blue
artist.content: Sound Blue is a South Korean music artist and producer, active in various creative endeavors under the Sound Blue name. The name represents the calm, deep emotions evoked by the color blue and the nature of sound itself.

label.title: SoundBlueMusic
label.content: SoundBlueMusic is an independent label led by Sound Blue. There's no professional studio yet—the room is the studio.

music.title: Music
music.content: Specializing in BGM, soundtracks, ambient, and instrumental music. Each piece is crafted to evoke emotions and create immersive atmospheres for games, videos, and other creative projects.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To create music that resonates with listeners and enhances creative works. Every composition aims to tell a story and transport listeners to new emotional landscapes.

projects.title: Projects
items: Original music releases on streaming platforms
Sound Recording: Field recording library for creative works
BGM and soundtrack commissions for games and videos

responses.greeting: Hello! How can I help you today? Feel free to ask about Sound Blue, music, licensing, or anything else on this site.
responses.help:
You can ask me about:
• Sound Blue (artist information)
• Music style and genres
• Sound recording license
• YouTube and external links
• Site navigation
• Current time and date (Seoul)

Just type your question!
responses.unknown: I'm not sure I understand. Could you try asking about 'Sound Blue', 'music', 'license', or type 'help' for more options?
responses.time: The current time in Seoul is {time}.

topics.about: Sound Blue is a South Korean indie artist and music producer. Creating original BGM, soundtracks, and instrumental music. You can learn more on the About page.
topics.music: Sound Blue specializes in BGM, soundtracks, ambient, and instrumental music. Each piece is crafted to evoke emotions and create immersive atmospheres.
topics.license: Sound Blue's sound recordings may only be used for creating original works. Redistribution and standalone distribution are prohibited. Please check the License page for details.
topics.soundRecording: The Sound Recording project provides high-quality field recordings for creative works. Nature sounds, urban ambience, and sound effects are available.
topics.contact:
You can find Sound Blue on:
• YouTube: youtube.com/@SoundBlueMusic
• Discography: soundblue.music
• GitHub: github.com/soundbluemusic
topics.builtWith: This website is built with SolidJS, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. It's deployed on Cloudflare Pages as a static site.
topics.navigation: You can find all pages in the Sitemap. Main sections include: Home, About, News, Blog, Sound Recording, and Built With.
